name: Arpari
headline: Treasury management for CRE
description: Treasury management platform built for commercial real estate. Seamlessly consolidate portfolio finances and manage financial operations from a single dashboard.
tags: industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:real-estate; industry:proptech; industry:neobank; location:new-york

founders.name: Alexandra Zwiener, Founder
founders.description:
Hello, I'm Alex, Co-Founder of Arpari. 

I began my career as a quantitative developer at Goldman Sachs, where I developed automated trading strategies and other financial applications. I have experience in financial modeling and risk management. My experience and interest in improving financial services led me to co-found Arpari. 

I received a BA in Mathematical Economics and Computer Science from University of Pennsylvania.

founders.name: Toby Edward, Founder
founders.description: Passionate about solving problems. Working to improve the commercial real estate banking experience. Background in real estate investing.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbe0_IconNav.svg)
# Cash visibility. Simplified.
Leave behind clunky bank portals and multiple log-ins. Access all your banking data and manage your treasury workflows from a single platform
[Request a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba4_Frame.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbad_Icon.svg)For real estate](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-real-estate>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba5_Frame-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbaf_Icon-3.svg)For asset managers](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-asset-managers>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba3_Frame-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbac_Icon-2.svg)For leisure & hospitality](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-leisure-hospitality>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba6_Frame-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbae_Icon-1.svg)For professional services](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-professional-services>)
## One dashboard, **_all_** your banks
Each day, high performing finance teams use the Arpari platform as their system record to manage over $1.0 billion
[Live balances](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Transactions](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Data enhancement](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Analytics](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)[Reconcilliation](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)[Payments](https://www.arpari.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-5>)
### Live balances
Easily understand and analyze your liquidity with pin-point accuracy. Utilize our API-based bank connections to aggregate real-time balances across your banks and entities into a single dashboard.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc3f_arpari-image__Live%20Balances-2.png)
### Transactions
Seamlessly view, search, and tag transactions within the dashboard. It takes seconds to toggle between banks or entities, simplifying month and quarter-end processes.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc3b_arpari-image__Transactions.png)
### Data enhancement
Easily identify and group transactions with in-platform transaction tagging. Enhance transactions with customizable metadata data tags, including from your general ledger.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc36_arpari-image__General%20ledger.png)
### Analytics
Generate reports, drill down into entity-level cash flows, and understand your bank exposure. Arpari empowers you to analyze trends and forecast cash in real-time.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc37_arpari-image__Analytics.png)
### Reconcilliation
Intelligent matching enables transaction reconciliation in minutes, increasing the productivity of your team and helping you to close your books faster.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc40_arpari-image__Reconcilliation.png)
### Payments
Full payments functionality enables bulk processing of payments from within the Arpari dashboard. Utilize our flexible approval chains to ensure compliance with operating procedures.
[Book a demo](https://www.arpari.com/</book-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc12_Payments.png)
## The core functionality you need
Empower your team with Arpari's comprehensivetreasury solution
### Seamless connectivity
Arpari’s API-based connectivity to almost every bank enables real-time data syncs with the click of a button, cutting down onboarding times to hours not weeks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc2c_Image-2333.png)
### Integrations
Enable data sharing and ensure interoperability between your workflows with ERP and accounting system integrations. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65b6bc0c39e7198ad1a4a545_Image-2%20\(2\).png)
### Collaborate
Easily invite team members and third-parties to your dashboard. Feel confident with our flexible permission settings & ability to toggle user access to specific accounts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc16_Image%20-1.png)
### Compliance & audit
Easy to track audit logs to monitor team member activity on the dashboard. Enable custom review and approval workflows.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc13_Image%20-2.png)
## Arpari-powered account opening
Seamless in-platform bank accounts available 24/7, 365
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc18_Frame%2010239.svg)
### Unlimited Accounts
Instantly open accounts with the click of a button — as many as you need
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc17_Icon-8.svg)
### Automated KYC
Automated KYC means approval within hours — and without the hassle of paperwork
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc21_Icon-9.svg)
### Multiple entities
All your banking on one dashboard — no limits on the number of entities you can open accounts for
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc1a_Icon-7.svg)
### No fees
Transfer funds via ACH or wire with no payment processing fees
[See how it works](https://www.arpari.com/</embedded-accounts>)
## Complex account structures made easy
All your accounts across all your entities aggregated in a single place
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbad_Icon.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba4_Frame.svg)For real estateBuilt for the complex account structures of real estate owners, managers, and developers](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-real-estate>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbaf_Icon-3.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba5_Frame-1.svg)For asset managersDesigned with the flexibility to handle hundreds of fund entities simultaneously ](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-asset-managers>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbac_Icon-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba3_Frame-2.svg)For leisure & hospitalityOptimized to simplify treasury operations for multi-location businesses](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-leisure-hospitality>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbae_Icon-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfba6_Frame-3.svg)For professional servicesSecure read-only access to your client's banking information, streamlining your processes](https://www.arpari.com/</use-cases/for-professional-services>)
## Our commitment to security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbf0_CryptoGraphyy.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc1d_Frame%20985696.svg)
### SOC 2 & penetration testing
Arpari has achieved SOC 2 certification. We additionally work with third-party cyber security experts to conduct regular penetration testing to detect vulnerabilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc1e_Icon-5.svg)
### Trusted partners
When we work with third parties to help provide services to you, we select leading partners who have adopted equally stringent security protocols.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc19_Icon-6.svg)
### Tokenization
Arpari uses tokenization to protect sensitive information by replacing it with a secure surrogate ID, called a token. That way, we only store that token, and not your actual data, making sure your information is always safe.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbb9_5.svg)
### End-to-end encryption
All data is transmitted with encryption-in-transit using HTTPS or similar protocols. All data is securely stored with encryption-at-rest using AES-256 or higher standards. Within databases, we leverage in-field encryption to protect sensitive data, including PII.
## Your treasury. Centralized.
Take the first step to streamlining your financial operations by scheduling a demonstration of the Arpari platform.

## Our commitment to security
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbf0_CryptoGraphyy.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc1d_Frame%20985696.svg)
### SOC 2 & penetration testing
Arpari has achieved SOC 2 certification. We additionally work with third-party cyber security experts to conduct regular penetration testing to detect vulnerabilities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc1e_Icon-5.svg)
### Trusted partners
When we work with third parties to help provide services to you, we select leading partners who have adopted equally stringent security protocols.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfc19_Icon-6.svg)
### Tokenization
Arpari uses tokenization to protect sensitive information by replacing it with a secure surrogate ID, called a token. That way, we only store that token, and not your actual data, making sure your information is always safe.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65add6a49a9426589c2bfb6b/65add6a49a9426589c2bfbb9_5.svg)
### End-to-end encryption
All data is transmitted with encryption-in-transit using HTTPS or similar protocols. All data is securely stored with encryption-at-rest using AES-256 or higher standards. Within databases, we leverage in-field encryption to protect sensitive data, including PII.
## Your treasury. Centralized.
Take the first step to streamlining your financial operations by scheduling a demonstration of the Arpari platform.

generated_description:
Arpari is a New York-based fintech startup founded in 2022, focused on treasury management specifically for commercial real estate (CRE). As part of Y Combinator’s W22 batch, Arpari is on the cutting edge of fintech solutions, helping real estate professionals manage their financial operations from a unified dashboard. 

Their mission is straightforward: to streamline treasury management for complex portfolio finances. The platform offers a range of features to revolutionize cash visibility and streamline operations. Users can access real-time bank balances, transaction history, and analytics, making financial management less burdensome and more efficient. Everything can be consolidated into a single platform, removing the headache of multiple logins and disconnected bank portals.

Arpari's current offerings include:
- **Treasury Software**: Helps organizations manage their cash flows and financial processes.
- **Account Opening**: Lets users set up bank accounts instantly, facilitating rapid onboarding.
- **Use Cases**: Specific solutions tailored for real estate, asset managers, leisure and hospitality sectors, and professional services.

The team comprises six dedicated employees, spearheaded by Group Partner Dalton Caldwell. Their tech stack supports seamless API connections with various banks, ensuring data syncs happen at the click of a button, dramatically reducing onboarding time.

Security is also a core tenet for Arpari, which boasts SOC 2 certification and employs end-to-end encryption to protect user data. 

In a nutshell, Arpari is shaping up to be a critical player in the intersection of fintech and real estate, promising to make treasury management more accessible and integrated for clients. For more details, you can visit their website at [Arpari.com](https://www.arpari.com).
